title: Bus Route
description: A bus route with its stops and waypoints in the Davao Interim Bus System

id.description: UUID7 identifier for the route. NEVER modify this after creation.

name.description: Human-readable route name (e.g., 'Toril to GE Torres')

area.description: Geographic area the route originates from

color.description: Hex color code for the route (e.g., #430dac)

points.description: Route points in sequence order: named bus stops and intermediate waypoints

id.description: UUID7 identifier for the point. NEVER modify this after creation.

name.description: Stop name as displayed on signage. Can be empty for waypoints.

latitude.description: Latitude in decimal degrees (Davao City range: 6.9-7.2)

longitude.description: Longitude in decimal degrees (Davao City range: 125.4-125.7)

kind.description: Point kind: 'stop' for named bus stops, 'waypoint' for intermediate points used for route snapping.
